physical_examinations.relevant_findings: New prosthetic valve vegetation with abscess formation.
MRI revealed numerous small hemorrhagic strokes in both hemispheres and the cerebellum.
Severe peri-root abscess with extension of infected material to the aortic wall.
Femoral pseudoaneurysm at the site of the embolectomy.

physical_examinations.date: 2 months after discharge from the hospital
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Echocardiogram demonstrated complete dehiscence of the valve in the absence of vegetations.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive improvement was noted with significant resolution of his left hemiparesis.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient is ambulatory and continues treatment with oral voriconazole.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant clinical improvement noted, except for photosensitivity dermatitis related to voriconazole.
